articles.author: Michael Birnbaum
articles.title: Italy’s political crisis is a gut punch to Europe
articles.description: Europe thought it had put questions about unity behind it. Italy might open old scars.

articles.author: David J. Lynch, Tony Romm
articles.title: U.S.-Europe ties strain over Trump’s trade war, online privacy disputes
articles.description: President Trump is intensifying hostilities on another major front in his global trade war.

articles.author: Laura Vozzella and Gregory S. Schneider
articles.title: Virginia Senate approves Medicaid expansion to 400,000 low-income residents
articles.description: Final legislative approval expected in a huge win for Democrats and Gov. Ralph Northam (D)

articles.author: David Weigel, Amy Gardner
articles.title: In Southern California, Democrats play the blame game as House races loom
articles.description: Activists and candidates fear that Democrats may cost themselves a place on the ballot in key races, endangering the national effort to take control of the House

articles.title: Legalizing marijuana is fine. But don’t ignore the science on its dangers.
articles.description: The drug I loved has major effects on the teenage brain.

articles.author: Steven Zeitchik
articles.title: Disney doesn’t want to offend anyone. But it’s getting caught in the culture wars.
articles.description: Conservative furor over the abrupt cancellation of “Roseanne” is not the first time the company has angered a political wing.

articles.author: Emily Heil
articles.title: Roseanne Barr blames Wanda Sykes, lashes out at co-stars: ‘You throw me under the bus’
articles.description: With her show canceled after her racist and vitriolic rant, Barr takes aim at her “Roseanne” team.

articles.author: Kristine Phillips
articles.title: ‘Racism is not a known side effect,’ Ambien maker says after Roseanne Barr blames it for tweets
articles.description: The celebrity claimed to have been “ambien tweeting” when she attacked former Obama adviser Valerie Jarrett in a racist post on the social network.

articles.author: Isabelle Khurshudyan, Roman Stubbs, Jesse Dougherty, Scott Allen, Dan Steinberg, Neil Greenberg
articles.title: 2018 NHL Stanley Cup finals: Capitals look to knot series with Golden Knights
articles.description: After a fast-paced, high-scoring start to the series, the Capitals and Golden Knights resume their pursuit of the Stanley Cup in Game 2.

articles.author: Rick Maese
articles.title: The house doesn’t always win: Las Vegas may lose millions on the Golden Knights
articles.description: Betting on a home team was largely a new experience for Vegas locals. But they bought in early on the Golden Knights, despite the long odds.
